title: Remove defunct EV charger and fit solar and battery compatible replacement.
review:
Ashley was friendly, knowledgeable and did a great job. He ensured that our new GivEnergy charger was properly integrated with the solar and battery system. 
During the job he found an earthing fault from previous work - and fixed this small job at no extra cost.
He took pride in his work and charged a fair price. 
We'd be happy to have him back next time we need a sparky.
name: Renegade Electrical Ltd
